short_description: intelligent glass is a glass & mirror store based in barnsley, united kingdom.
long_description: for over 20 years, intelligent glass has been developing its own range of patented switchable smart glass technology. a british manufacturer dedicated to quality and reliability, the products manufactured by intelligent glass are designed to offer instant and controllable privacy using switchable smart glass. unique to the market, intelligent glass also offers a proprietary self-adhesive switchable film that can be retrofitted to existing windows and partitions, making this technology even more versatile and accessible. from award winning architecture projects , to unveiling the world's most luxurious cars , we have seen switchable technology work well in an extremely wide range of environments, including but not limited to homes, hotels, offices, healthcare, retail, hospitality and much more. switchable glass technology offers users a functional high definition projection screen, as well as having sound insulating, fire rated and coloured specialist options available. we pride ourselves on our unique range of switchable glass & film technologies with class-leading quality, flexibility and performance.

generated_description: intelligent glass, legally known as intelligent glass company, based in barnsley, england, specializes in the development and manufacturing of switchable smart glass technology. the company offers a wide range of products, including single, laminated, and double/triple glazed switchable glass, as well as self-adhesive switchable film. these products are designed to provide instant and controllable privacy, security, and energy efficiency. intelligent glass serves various sectors such as corporate, leisure, healthcare, hospitality, retail, and yacht/marine. the company is part of the pro display group and is known for its innovative and high-quality products.
